Watching Tim Vine's stand-up on Dave. His strategy is "unrelenting", and you cannot help but be impressed. Depressed, confused, exasperated, disappointed in humanity and all that you hold scared, but impressed. He bludgeons you to a bloody pulp but you do laugh, eventually.
